Submodules¶

analyzer.plot_config.plt_Base module¶

class analyzer.plot_config.plt_Base.Base(plots, title=' ', x_label='time', y_label='Y-Axis', legend='upper left', share_x='', share_y='', grid=True, plot_type='LinLin', regression='')[source]¶

Bases: object

The Base module is the parent class of all plot_types that are specified in plot_types module. This class defines the init method, the most basic configuration can be stored here. For basic 2-dimensional plots, the plot method is specified in two_d.plot_TwoD.TwoD.plot(). For further specification, plot() calls (if it exists) the plot_specific method, which can be defined in every plot type.
